text: Ekamatra te'omloke'i allahara machajidasamuhara tatbaradhayana laba, yisakale imana aniche allahara prati arau sesa dirasara prati, chalata kayema karae arau yakata pradana karae lagate allahara bahirae ana kako bhaya nakarae. Eteke asa karaa yaya ye, te'omloke'i haâ€™ba satpatha praaptasakalara antarbhukta
